select
distinct
from t_rms_recruitinfo
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_rms_recruitinfo (N_STUDENT_ID, S_CANDIDATE_NUM, S_STUDENT_NAME, S_STUDENT_NO, N_AGE, C_SEX, S_ADDRESS, S_CONTACT, S_EMAIL, S_OTHER_CTACT, S_ENROL_MAJOR, S_ADMITED_MAJOR, S_ADMITED_NO, S_GRADE, S_REGISTER_FLAG, S_POLITIIS, S_PAY_FLAG, S_OPERATOR, S_OPERATOR_NO, D_OPERATE_TIME, S_STATUS ) values (#{nStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sCandidateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sStudentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sStudentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOtherCtact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sEnrolMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sAdmitedMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sAdmitedNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sRegisterFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPolitiis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOperatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dOperateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

S_CANDIDATE_NUM = #{record.sCandidateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
